engChrName: I'm detecting multiple monsters farther inside!
engSearchText: I'm detecting multiple monsters farther inside!
jpnChrName: 魔獣の気配、多数です……！
jpnSearchText: 魔獣の気配、多数です……！

engChrName: Tch! Just where did they all come from?
engSearchText: Tch! Just where did they all come from?
jpnChrName: チッ、いったいどこから 紛れ込みやがった！？
jpnSearchText:
チッ、いったいどこから
紛れ込みやがった！？

engChrName: And the timing couldn't have been worse...
engSearchText: And the timing couldn't have been worse...
jpnChrName: あいつが入ってる時に なんつう間の悪い……！
jpnSearchText:
あいつが入ってる時に
なんつう間の悪い……！

engChrName: Arkride, was it? And the rest of you, too—you all strike me as a tough bunch.
engSearchText:
Arkride, was it? And the rest of you, too—you all
strike me as a tough bunch.
jpnChrName: ……アークライドっつったな。 他のもそれなりに腕は立ちそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
……アークライドっつったな。
他のもそれなりに腕は立ちそうだ。

engChrName: I promise to reward you handsomely, so...save him. Please.
engSearchText:
I promise to reward you handsomely, so...save him.
Please.
jpnChrName: 相応の報酬は約束する── あの子の助けになってやってくれ。
jpnSearchText:
相応の報酬は約束する──
あの子の助けになってやってくれ。

engChrName: I'll contact the guild and someone who can help in the meantime, though, so don't go crazy!
engSearchText:
I'll contact the guild and someone who can help in
the meantime, though, so don't go crazy!
jpnChrName: ギルドと他の助っ人も呼んでおく、 無理だけはするんじゃねぇぞ……！
jpnSearchText:
ギルドと他の助っ人も呼んでおく、
無理だけはするんじゃねぇぞ……！

engChrName: Lucky for us we've got him on our side, huh? All right, folks—let's get movin'.
engSearchText:
Lucky for us we've got him on our side, huh?
All right, folks—let's get movin'.
jpnChrName: 話の分かる爺さんで助かったぜ。 ──よし、そんじゃあ奥に向かうぞ。
jpnSearchText:
話の分かる爺さんで助かったぜ。
──よし、そんじゃあ奥に向かうぞ。

engChrName: Right! We have to save Quatre!
engSearchText: Right! We have to save Quatre!
jpnChrName: はい……！ 何とかカトル君を助けないと！
jpnSearchText:
はい……！
何とかカトル君を助けないと！

engChrName: Indeed. I heard the faint sound of gunfire moments ago.
engSearchText:
Indeed. I heard the faint sound of gunfire
moments ago.
jpnChrName: ええ──それと先程から 微かに“射撃音”が聞こえますね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ──それと先程から
微かに“射撃音”が聞こえますね。

engChrName: What, is he packing or something? Kinda dangerous for a kid like him, right?
engSearchText:
What, is he packing or something? Kinda dangerous
for a kid like him, right?
jpnChrName: なんか得物でも持ってんのか？ ま、ヒョロガキだしヤバそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
なんか得物でも持ってんのか？
ま、ヒョロガキだしヤバそうだが。

engChrName: Either way, let's hurry!
engSearchText: Either way, let's hurry!
jpnChrName: とにかく急ぎましょう！
jpnSearchText: とにかく急ぎましょう！

engChrName: Found him!
engSearchText: Found him!
jpnChrName: いたか……！
jpnSearchText: いたか……！

engChrName: Qu-Quatre!
engSearchText: Qu-Quatre!
jpnChrName: カ、カトル君……！
jpnSearchText: カ、カトル君……！

engChrName: What's that silver thing?
engSearchText: What's that silver thing?
jpnChrName: あの銀色のは……？
jpnSearchText: あの銀色のは……？

engChrName: Detecting small-scale seismic shift.
engSearchText: Detecting small-scale seismic shift.
jpnChrName: 小規模地殻変動ノ予兆ヲ感知──
jpnSearchText: 小規模地殻変動ノ予兆ヲ感知──

engChrName: Ugh. That thing from before?
engSearchText: Ugh. That thing from before?
jpnChrName: くっ、さっきのアレか！
jpnSearchText: くっ、さっきのアレか！

engChrName: Gah! ...Aaah!
engSearchText: Gah! ...Aaah!
jpnChrName: っ……うわああっ……！
jpnSearchText: っ……うわああっ……！

engChrName: HAAAAAAH!
engSearchText: HAAAAAAH!
jpnChrName: ──おおおおっ！！
jpnSearchText: ──おおおおっ！！
っ……！？

engChrName: Are you all right?!
engSearchText: Are you all right?!
jpnChrName: 大丈夫ですか！？
jpnSearchText: 大丈夫ですか！？

engChrName: Agnès? ...You're ALL here...
engSearchText: Agnès? ...You're ALL here...
jpnChrName: ア、アニエスさん、 他の人たちも……
jpnSearchText:
ア、アニエスさん、
他の人たちも……

engChrName: Damn. What'd you just do to neutralize the tremors?
engSearchText: Damn. What'd you just do to neutralize the tremors?
jpnChrName: チッ、地響きを かき消しやがっただと……！？
jpnSearchText:
チッ、地響きを
かき消しやがっただと……！？

engChrName: He paired the stun caliber and hollow style together most magnificently.
engSearchText:
He paired the stun caliber and hollow style together
most magnificently.
jpnChrName: スタンキャリバーと 零式勁術の応用──お見事です。
jpnSearchText:
スタンキャリバーと
零式勁術の応用──お見事です。

engChrName: The timing just happened to work out. It ain't gonna be happenin' again.
engSearchText:
The timing just happened to work out. It ain't gonna
be happenin' again.
jpnChrName: たまたまタイミングが合っただけだ、 次はねえ。
jpnSearchText:
たまたまタイミングが合っただけだ、
次はねえ。

engChrName: A subspecies of the abyss worm! Watch out for their chain counterattacks!
engSearchText:
A subspecies of the abyss worm! Watch out for their
chain counterattacks!
jpnChrName: アビスワーム亜種……！ 連鎖反撃に注意してください！
jpnSearchText:
アビスワーム亜種……！
連鎖反撃に注意してください！

engChrName: Use solo skills or arts to take 'em down! Are you good to go?!
engSearchText:
Use solo skills or arts to take 'em down! Are you good
to go?!
jpnChrName: 単体技かアーツで仕留めるぞ！ ──お前さんも行けそうか！？
jpnSearchText:
単体技かアーツで仕留めるぞ！
──お前さんも行けそうか！？

engChrName: Mgh... Yes, I can still fight!
engSearchText: Mgh... Yes, I can still fight!
jpnChrName: っ…… ──ええ、対応できます！
jpnSearchText:
っ……
──ええ、対応できます！

engChrName: FIO, be sure to work with them!
engSearchText: FIO, be sure to work with them!
jpnChrName: 《ＦＩＯ（フィオ）》、彼らに合わせよう！
jpnSearchText: 《ＦＩＯ（フィオ）》、彼らに合わせよう！

engChrName: Understood. Initiating interception protocol!
engSearchText: Understood. Initiating interception protocol!
jpnChrName: リョウカイ。 迎撃プロトコル、起動──！
jpnSearchText:
リョウカイ。
迎撃プロトコル、起動──！

engChrName: Found  .
engSearchText:
Found
.
jpnChrName: 魔獣が{CC_ITEM=ITEM_QUARTZ_W_050}を落とした。
jpnSearchText: 魔獣が{CC_ITEM=ITEM_QUARTZ_W_050}を落とした。

engChrName: Was that all of them?
engSearchText: Was that all of them?
jpnChrName: ……これで全部か？
jpnSearchText: ……これで全部か？

engChrName: I believe that to be the case, yes.
engSearchText: I believe that to be the case, yes.
jpnChrName: はい、おそらくは……
jpnSearchText: はい、おそらくは……

engChrName: Are you hurt at all, Quatre?
engSearchText: Are you hurt at all, Quatre?
jpnChrName: 大丈夫ですか、カトル君？
jpnSearchText: 大丈夫ですか、カトル君？

engChrName: I'm fine... I didn't realize you would all come.
engSearchText: I'm fine... I didn't realize you would all come.
jpnChrName: ああ……大丈夫。 貴方たちも来てくれたんですね。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……大丈夫。
貴方たちも来てくれたんですね。

engChrName: Sorry for causing you so much trouble.
engSearchText: Sorry for causing you so much trouble.
jpnChrName: その、お手数をかけました。
jpnSearchText: その、お手数をかけました。

engChrName: Ha! 'Trouble' is right. Least you weren't dumb enough to come here unarmed.
engSearchText:
Ha! 'Trouble' is right. Least you weren't dumb
enough to come here unarmed.
jpnChrName: ハッ、まったくだぜ。 一応武装はしてたみてぇだが。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、まったくだぜ。
一応武装はしてたみてぇだが。

engChrName: An orbal pulse gun, eh? And you know your way around combat from what I saw.
engSearchText:
An orbal pulse gun, eh? And you know your way
around combat from what I saw.
jpnChrName: 導力パルスガンか？ なかなかの射撃センスだ。
jpnSearchText:
導力パルスガンか？
なかなかの射撃センスだ。

engChrName: Same with this floating thing, too.
engSearchText: Same with this floating thing, too.
jpnChrName: そっちの浮いてるのもな。
jpnSearchText: そっちの浮いてるのもな。

engChrName: Floating thing?
engSearchText: Floating thing?
jpnChrName: 浮イテルノ？
jpnSearchText: 浮イテルノ？

engChrName: Wow...
engSearchText: Wow...
jpnChrName: わぁ……
jpnSearchText: わぁ……

engChrName: It's adorable...
engSearchText: It's adorable...
jpnChrName: か、可愛いですね……
jpnSearchText: か、可愛いですね……

engChrName: Haha, you think? This little guy is named FIO.
engSearchText: Haha, you think? This little guy is named FIO.
jpnChrName: はは……そうかな？ ＦＩＯって言うんだけど。
jpnSearchText:
はは……そうかな？
ＦＩＯって言うんだけど。

engChrName: Much as I'd love to hear more, you mind if we shift to talking about what happened?
engSearchText:
Much as I'd love to hear more, you mind if we shift
to talking about what happened?
jpnChrName: そいつも気になるが 一体、何があったんだ？
jpnSearchText:
そいつも気になるが
一体、何があったんだ？

engChrName: I'd heard there aren't supposed to be monsters in here. You were checkin' the lights, right?
engSearchText:
I'd heard there aren't supposed to be monsters
in here. You were checkin' the lights, right?
jpnChrName: 魔獣はいないって話だったが…… 照明の点検に入ったんだったか？
jpnSearchText:
魔獣はいないって話だったが……
照明の点検に入ったんだったか？

engChrName: Well...
engSearchText: Well...
jpnChrName: それが……
jpnSearchText: それが……

engChrName: That's weird...
engSearchText: That's weird...
jpnChrName: なんだ……？
jpnSearchText: なんだ……？

engChrName: Were they damaged?
engSearchText: Were they damaged?
jpnChrName: えと……故障でしょうか？
jpnSearchText: えと……故障でしょうか？

engChrName: No. They were just swapped out the other day.
engSearchText: No. They were just swapped out the other day.
jpnChrName: いや、つい先日に 交換されたばかりなんだ。
jpnSearchText:
いや、つい先日に
交換されたばかりなんだ。

engChrName: Plus...
engSearchText: Plus...
jpnChrName: それも──
jpnSearchText: それも──

engChrName: It's not just that one that's gone bad. It's happening to all of 'em along the tunnel.
engSearchText:
It's not just that one that's gone bad. It's happening to
all of 'em along the tunnel.
jpnChrName: 一つだけじゃなく 坑道全体で起きてるみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
一つだけじゃなく
坑道全体で起きてるみたいだな。

engChrName: ...You're right.
engSearchText: ...You're right.

engChrName: These are self-sufficient lights, so they aren't on the orbal distribution network.
engSearchText:
These are self-sufficient lights, so they aren't on the
orbal distribution network.
jpnChrName: ……導力供給網からではない、 自足式の導力灯のようですが。
jpnSearchText:
……導力供給網からではない、
自足式の導力灯のようですが。

engChrName: Exactly—which means this kind of behavior should be impossible.
engSearchText:
Exactly—which means this kind of behavior should
be impossible.
jpnChrName: ええ、ですからこんな挙動は 本来有り得ないんです。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、ですからこんな挙動は
本来有り得ないんです。

engChrName: So why—
engSearchText: So why—
jpnChrName: いったいどうして──
jpnSearchText: いったいどうして──

engChrName: Get back here!
engSearchText: Get back here!
jpnChrName: 離れろ！
jpnSearchText: <S5>離れろ！

engChrName: Guh!
engSearchText: Guh!

engChrName: There's more of 'em?!
engSearchText: There's more of 'em?!
jpnChrName: 残ってやがったか……！
jpnSearchText: 残ってやがったか……！

engChrName: This isn't good. Everyone, prepare for combat!
engSearchText: This isn't good. Everyone, prepare for combat!
jpnChrName: いけません──各個撃破を！
jpnSearchText: いけません──各個撃破を！

engChrName: Tch!
engSearchText: Tch!
jpnChrName: ちっ……！
jpnSearchText: ちっ……！

engChrName: Van!
engSearchText: Van!
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんっ！
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさんっ！

engChrName: RUFF!
engSearchText: RUFF!
jpnChrName: ＢＯＷ！！
jpnSearchText: ＢＯＷ！！

engChrName: XEROS!
engSearchText: XEROS!
jpnChrName: ──《ＸＥＲＯＳ（ゼロス）》！
jpnSearchText: ──《ＸＥＲＯＳ（ゼロス）》！

engChrName: Now, Alvis!
engSearchText: Now, Alvis!
jpnChrName: 今よ、アルヴィス！
jpnSearchText: 今よ、アルヴィス！

engChrName: HAAAH!
engSearchText: HAAAH!
jpnChrName: らああああああっ……！
jpnSearchText: らああああああっ……！

engChrName: Does anyone here need medical attention?
engSearchText: Does anyone here need medical attention?
jpnChrName: よし──大丈夫か！？
jpnSearchText: よし──大丈夫か！？

engChrName: Did you come all the way from the capital?
engSearchText: Did you come all the way from the capital?
jpnChrName: 首都から来られていた……
jpnSearchText: 首都から来られていた……

engChrName: Heh. Nice heroic entrance there, junior-senior bracer.
engSearchText: Heh. Nice heroic entrance there, junior-senior bracer.
jpnChrName: はは、助かったぜ準エース。
jpnSearchText: はは、助かったぜ準エース。

engChrName: Hmph. Well, YOU seem fine.
engSearchText: Hmph. Well, YOU seem fine.
jpnChrName: ……フン、平気そうだな。
jpnSearchText: ……フン、平気そうだな。

engChrName: Thanks for rushing over here, XEROS.
engSearchText: Thanks for rushing over here, XEROS.
jpnChrName: ……ＸＥＲＯＳもありがとう。 駆け付けてくれて。
jpnSearchText:
……ＸＥＲＯＳもありがとう。
駆け付けてくれて。

engChrName: RUFF.
engSearchText: RUFF.
jpnChrName: ＢＯＷ．
jpnSearchText: ＢＯＷ．

engChrName: Whoa! A black wolf?!
engSearchText: Whoa! A black wolf?!
jpnChrName: わぁ……黒い“狼”！？
jpnSearchText: わぁ……黒い“狼”！？

engChrName: It's starting to feel like just about anything could pop up around here.
engSearchText:
It's starting to feel like just about anything could pop
up around here.
jpnChrName: オイオイ、何でもアリかよ。
jpnSearchText: オイオイ、何でもアリかよ。

engChrName: (I see. So that's what is being tested here...)
engSearchText: (I see. So that's what is being tested here...)
jpnChrName: （──なるほど、こちらで   テスト研究されているという……）
jpnSearchText:
（──なるほど、こちらで
テスト研究されているという……）

engChrName: Are all of you okay?!
engSearchText: Are all of you okay?!
jpnChrName: カトル、お前らも大丈夫か……！？
jpnSearchText: カトル、お前らも大丈夫か……！？

engChrName: Supervisor...
engSearchText: Supervisor...
jpnChrName: 親方……
jpnSearchText: 親方……

engChrName: Phew. Guess that wraps up this little adventure, then.
engSearchText: Phew. Guess that wraps up this little adventure, then.
jpnChrName: やれやれ…… これで一件落着だな。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……
これで一件落着だな。

engChrName: I-I'm okay now! You can let go!
engSearchText: I-I'm okay now! You can let go!
jpnChrName: も、もう大丈夫ですからっ……！
jpnSearchText: も、もう大丈夫ですからっ……！

engChrName: I believe this is the innermost depths of the sealed area.
engSearchText:
I believe this is the innermost depths of the
sealed area.
jpnChrName: ここが封鎖区画の最奥だと思います。
jpnSearchText: ここが封鎖区画の最奥だと思います。

engChrName: Take a look at the surface of that boulder in the back.
engSearchText:
Take a look at the surface of that boulder in
the back.
jpnChrName: 皆さん、奥の壁面を見てください。
jpnSearchText: 皆さん、奥の壁面を見てください。

engChrName: It's glowing... It must be Zemuria Moss.
engSearchText: It's glowing... It must be Zemuria Moss.
jpnChrName: 発光する苔…… ゼムリア苔で間違いなさそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
発光する苔……
ゼムリア苔で間違いなさそうですね。

engChrName: It looks so mysterious...
engSearchText: It looks so mysterious...
jpnChrName: 何だか神秘的ですね。
jpnSearchText: 何だか神秘的ですね。

engChrName: All right, let's grab some!
engSearchText: All right, let's grab some!
jpnChrName: うし、さっそく採取すんぞ。
jpnSearchText: うし、さっそく採取すんぞ。

engChrName: Actually, before that—
engSearchText: Actually, before that—
jpnChrName: ──と、行きたいところだが。
jpnSearchText: ──と、行きたいところだが。

engChrName: It's approaching from above! Be careful!
engSearchText: It's approaching from above! Be careful!
jpnChrName: 上から来ます──ご注意を！
jpnSearchText: 上から来ます──ご注意を！

engChrName: This pressure... We must be invading its territory.
engSearchText: This pressure... We must be invading its territory.
jpnChrName: この威圧感…… 封鎖区画のヌシのようですね。
jpnSearchText:
この威圧感……
封鎖区画のヌシのようですね。

engChrName: Yeah. Stay focused, people! We're driving it back!
engSearchText: Yeah. Stay focused, people! We're driving it back!
jpnChrName: ああ──気を引き締めて撃退すんぞ！
jpnSearchText: ああ──気を引き締めて撃退すんぞ！

engChrName: Phew. I'm glad that worked out.
engSearchText: Phew. I'm glad that worked out.
jpnChrName: ふう、何とかなりましたね。
jpnSearchText: ふう、何とかなりましたね。

engChrName: Very nice work, everyone.
engSearchText: Very nice work, everyone.
jpnChrName: 皆さん、お疲れさまでした。
jpnSearchText: 皆さん、お疲れさまでした。

engChrName: Time to grab the goods.
engSearchText: Time to grab the goods.
jpnChrName: さて、目的のブツを回収すっか。
jpnSearchText: さて、目的のブツを回収すっか。

engChrName: Obtained Zemuria Moss.
engSearchText: Obtained Zemuria Moss.
jpnChrName: 『ゼムリア苔』を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>『ゼムリア苔』を手に入れた。

engChrName: So this is Zemuria Moss? Its pale glow makes it quite the mysterious plant.
engSearchText:
So this is Zemuria Moss? Its pale glow makes it quite
the mysterious plant.
jpnChrName: これがゼムリア苔…… 淡く光っていて不思議な植物ですね。
jpnSearchText:
これがゼムリア苔……
淡く光っていて不思議な植物ですね。

engChrName: I bet this'd go for a shitton of mira if we grabbed 'em by the root.
engSearchText:
I bet this'd go for a shitton of mira if we grabbed 'em
by the root.
jpnChrName: 根こそぎ回収すれば、 かなりのミラになりそうなんだがな。
jpnSearchText:
根こそぎ回収すれば、
かなりのミラになりそうなんだがな。

engChrName: They're important research materials, so please only take what you need.
engSearchText:
They're important research materials, so please only
take what you need.
jpnChrName: ……貴重な研究試料なので 必要な分だけでお願いします。
jpnSearchText:
……貴重な研究試料なので
必要な分だけでお願いします。

engChrName: Heh. Just messing around.
engSearchText: Heh. Just messing around.
jpnChrName: ハッ、冗談だよ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、冗談だよ。

engChrName: Pretty sure you were at least half serious.
engSearchText: Pretty sure you were at least half serious.
jpnChrName: 半分以上、本気だった気がしますが。
jpnSearchText: 半分以上、本気だった気がしますが。

engChrName: Eh, not like I don't get where he's comin' from.
engSearchText: Eh, not like I don't get where he's comin' from.
jpnChrName: ま、気持ちは分からんでもないがな。
jpnSearchText: ま、気持ちは分からんでもないがな。

engChrName: Anyway, that's that job done. Let's get back to the research lab.
engSearchText:
Anyway, that's that job done. Let's get back to the
research lab.
jpnChrName: とにかくこれでミッション達成だ。 とっとと研究室に戻るぞ。
jpnSearchText:
とにかくこれでミッション達成だ。
とっとと研究室に戻るぞ。

engChrName: Obtained Zemuria Moss.
engSearchText: Obtained Zemuria Moss.
jpnChrName: 『ゼムリア苔』を手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>『ゼムリア苔』を手に入れた。

engChrName: Unlocked the door to the sealed area.
engSearchText: Unlocked the door to the sealed area.
jpnChrName: 封鎖区画の扉を解錠した。
jpnSearchText: <C1>封鎖区画の扉を解錠した。

engChrName: Great. Now we can keep moving.
engSearchText: Great. Now we can keep moving.
jpnChrName: よし、これで先に進めるな。
jpnSearchText: よし、これで先に進めるな。

engChrName: Right. Let's make our way to the innermost depths for the Zemuria Moss!
engSearchText:
Right. Let's make our way to the innermost depths
for the Zemuria Moss!
jpnChrName: はい、ゼムリア苔のある 最奥を目指して探索しましょう！
jpnSearchText:
はい、ゼムリア苔のある
最奥を目指して探索しましょう！
